Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is contradicted by evidence provided in the form of the AP video and screenshots.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video was filmed in 2021, as it is proven to be from 2016.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim may have alternative explanations, such as misunderstanding or misinterpretation of the video by some Weibo users.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the video by suggesting that it shows Pence and Biden meeting in 2021, when in fact it is an old footage.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that Pence and Biden meeting in the video has some significant meaning or implications.
Understate: No evidence of understatement bias is present in the given claim.
Falters at times: No evidence of faltering bias is present in the given claim.
